item.description:
To all who dare to enter.... BEWARE!
Saturday, November 1st, 2008 is the annual
Esby Halloween Ball
Halloween is a special time of the year when the veil between this world and the spirit world is the thinnest! Experience a rocking celebration for both the living AND the dead. Join Internationally Known Psychic Medium, Isabeau Esby, as she calls in the spirits of our loved ones for a haunting good time. Connect to your generations past and pay tribute to those who have come before us.
Dance the night away and pump up the energy with music by the ever popular DJ Razz. Food supplied by Mulligan catering. Cash bar also available.
This years event will be held downtown Portsmouth above the American Legion at 8 PM
There will be a costume contest so get creative!
The hall holds 80, tickets will be limited.
It is important to purchase tickets ahead of time, please contact Isabeau at 603-973-1898 or at isabeauesby@comcast.net
www.IsabeauEsby.com
Ticket pricing - $20 per person
Group ticket pricing - $15 per person for two or more tickets
Make sure to bring your loved ones... alive or not!
item.how_to_find_us: It will be upstairs above the American Legion
item.name: The Esby Halloween Ball
